price: 51. Pour qu’Allah rétribue chaque âme selon ce qu’elle aura acquis, car Allah est prompt à dresser les comptes.
arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ كُلَّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya al-lahu kulla nafsin mā kasabat inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
